General.Name: Chongqing Sokon Ind Grp Co
General.Description: Seres Group Co.,Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, sells, and supplies automobiles, auto parts and other products in China. The company was formerly known as Chongqing Sokon Industry Group Stock Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Seres Group Co.,Ltd. in July 2022. Seres Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is based in Chongqing, China.
General.Address: No. 7, Wuyun Lake Road, Chongqing, China
